titles.title: A joint resolution to disapprove the proposed agreement for cooperation between the Government of the United States of America and the Government of Japan concerning peaceful uses of nuclear energy, transmitted to the Congress by the President on November 9, 1987.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 581.

action.text: Motion to proceed to consideration of measure agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41-40. Record Vote No: 65.

vote.text: Failed of passage in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30-53. Record Vote No: 66.

bill.summary: 1/27/1988--Introduced. Disapproves the proposed U.S.-Japan cooperation agreement concerning peaceful uses of nuclear energy.
